name: Dollaween
description:
Run an online store where you harvest and craft materials to sell to your customers to authentically haunt their dolls.

This game was made for a game jam from October 27th to October 29th in 2017. The theme was "Five Elements."

Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
